title: Hurricane Melissa death toll rises as ‘dangerous storm surge’ expected in Bahamas – latest updates
summary: Four people have been confirmed dead in Jamaica, while dozens have died in Haiti due to severe weather conditions. A hurricane warning is currently in effect for regions including Bermuda. The situation remains critical as authorities monitor the impact of the storm.

title: Carabao Cup quarter-final draw after Arsenal, Chelsea, Newcastle, Man City through – live
summary: Michael Butler will provide live goal updates for the fourth round of the Carabao Cup. Fans can join him to stay informed on all the action from the matches. Get ready for an exciting day of football!

title: Teenage cricketer in Australia dies after being hit with cricket ball in Melbourne’s east
summary: The Ferntree Gully cricket club has confirmed the tragic death of a 17-year-old following an incident that occurred in the cricket nets on Tuesday. The club expressed its condolences to the young athlete's family and community. Details surrounding the incident remain under investigation.

title: Liverpool 0-3 Crystal Palace: Carabao Cup – live reaction
summary: Arne Slot's choice to field a weakened team without backup options didn't pay off, leading to a poor performance. Ismaïla Sarr capitalized on the situation, once again excelling against Liverpool. Scott Murray provides a minute-by-minute update on the unfolding events.
